Gaondodam Pure Bubble Cleanser

Brand: GAONDODAM

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, SORBITOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, LAURYL GLUCOSIDE, DISODIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE, POLYGLYCERYL-6 CAPRYLATE, vegetable GLYCOPROTEINS, BETA-GLUCAN, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYGLYCERYL-10 LAURATE, PROPANEDIOL

Directions: Pump the top of t

s: Pump the top of the cleanser two or three times, softly clean your face, and rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Warnings: 1. In case of getting red spots, inflation or itching side-effects while or after using the product, contact a doctor right away. 2. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. 3. Handling and storage precautions: 1) Keep out of re

s: 1) Keep out of reach of children. 2) Keep away from direct sunlight.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
